name: RES_SPECIAL_CASE_TYPE
description: This table contains a result's BI-RADS special case type.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPECIAL_CASE_C_NAME
columns.description: This column contains a result's BI-RADS special case type.
